ARABIC: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Every self will taste death. Then you will be returned to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Every soul has to know the taste of death. You will then be sent back to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Every being shall taste death, then it is to Us that you shall be sent back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Every soul will experience the agony of death and to Me you will all return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Every soul must taste death; then it is to Us that you will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Everyone shall taste death. Then unto Us you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Every soul must taste of death, then to Us you shall be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Every soul shall taste of death; then unto Us you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Every soul will taste of death. Then unto Us ye will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Every soul shall taste death and then to Us you shall return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Every soul shall taste of death; then unto Us ye shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Every soul shall taste death. Then you shall be brought back to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Every soul shall have a taste of death in the end to Us shall ye be brought back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Everyone shall taste the death. Then unto Us you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Every soul shall taste death, and to Us you shall be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us you will be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:57] Every soul shall taste death. Then to Us you shall be returned (turja‘ūna; or yurja‘ūna, ‘they shall be returned’) after resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Every soul) every creature possessed of a breath (will taste of death. Then unto Us you will be returned) after death and you will be rewarded according to your works.
